Navigation Bar

The Navigation Bar provides the primary way for users to move through the Sport Wales site. It supports standard navigation, search-focused tasks, and login functionality.

1. Default Navbar (Blue)

The standard navigation used on most content pages. It features the primary blue branding, language toggle, and core menu links.

Switch to Welsh

2. Search Focus Navbar (Red)

A variant used on search results pages or when search is the primary action. This version expands to show a large, centered search bar.

Switch to Welsh

Type here

3. Login Navbar

A specialized variant for user portals. It replaces the standard links with portal-specific navigation and adds a prominent Login button.

Implementation Notes

  • Responsive Behavior: The navbar stacks vertically on screens smaller than 1280px (XL breakpoint).
  • Colors: Use bg-[#002d72] for Primary Blue and bg-[#e30613] for Primary Red.
  • Assets: Ensure all SVG assets (logos, icons) are accessible in the /assets/navbar/ directory.
